title: Create Team Flag Shader with Wind Animation
focus: All acceptance criteria met - flag shader with wind animation complete

criteria.text: Flag mesh deforms with wind wave
criteria.notes: Vertex shader applies sin() wave displacement with primary and secondary frequencies

criteria.text: Wave stronger at edge, weaker near pole
criteria.notes: wave_amount = uv.x * (1.0 - uv.y * 0.5) - stronger at edge (uv.x=1), weaker at pole (uv.x=0)
FlagTeam enum with Red/Blue variants, FlagMaterialConfig.for_team() provides team colors
smoothstep band at uv.y=0.45-0.55 blends with stripe_color at 85% mix
flag.wgsl compiles successfully via include_str! in flag_material.rs
Verified cargo check passes with no errors (only pre-existing warnings)

checklist.item: Read spec.md and understand vertex wind animation
Implement vertex shader with wave displacement
Implement fragment shader with stripe pattern

worker_notes: All criteria met. Created flag.wgsl with FlagUniforms (128 bytes), vertex shader with sin() wave displacement (stronger at edge, weaker near pole), and fragment shader with horizontal stripe pattern. Created flag_material.rs with FlagMaterial struct, FlagTeam enum (Red/Blue), FlagMaterialConfig with presets, and FlagVertex helper for mesh generation. Exported in mod.rs. cargo check passes.

notes_history.note: Completed all implementation: flag.wgsl shader with wind animation and stripe pattern, flag_material.rs with FlagMaterial/FlagTeam/FlagMaterialConfig, exports in mod.rs. cargo check passes.

iteration_history.action: Created flag shader and material module
iteration_history.notes: All acceptance criteria met in first iteration

learnings: Flag wind animation uses UV.x to scale wave amplitude - pole (x=0) stays fixed, free edge (x=1) waves most
Team colors should use FlagTeam enum for type safety rather than raw Vec3 colors
Horizontal stripe uses smoothstep difference for anti-aliased band
